betterquesting:10.desc:8:
Aberrant Pickaxe: A Tool That Defies Convention
The Aberrant Pickaxe operates in a way that challenges traditional expectations:

Performance:

The harder the material (e.g., obsidian), the faster it mines.
Softer materials (e.g., stone) are mined very slowly, while some easy-to-break blocks (like grass) cannot be mined at all.
Bedrock: As for breaking bedrock... better not get your hopes up!
Crafting Requirement:

Requires a 100-Essentia Crystal Shard, which is obtained by mining Permeable Stone.
Permeable Stone is created when Corrupted Stone undergoes purification.
This pickaxe is a paradoxical marvel, tailored for unique circumstances and designed for thaumaturges ready to embrace its eccentricities.
